mapper.select: SELECT commu_no, commu_id, commu_name, commu_title, to_char(commu_date, 'YYYY-DD-MM' ) commu_date, commu_content, commu_hit FROM PAS_COMMUNITY ORDER BY commu_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAS_COMMUNITY ( commu_no, commu_id, commu_title, commu_name, commu_content, commu_date ) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(commu_no),0)+1 from PAS_COMMUNITY), #{ param1 }, #{ param2 }, #{ param3 }, #{ param4 }, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PAS_COMMUNITY WHERE commu_no = #{ param1 }
